reviews.review_msg: Great professor from both a research and practical perspective. Class teaches very unique subjects that is not found in any other ENSC class. Makes people do presentations to enforce understanding, including one on cutting-edge research. Class is the only one from ENSC that feels like it's from the current decade and not the last century.

Anita is by far one of the best professors I have had, if not the best.

We had a lot of difficult material to cover, expect to be working a little too hard. But you come out of that class with a lot of useful knowledge.

You will have to pay attention in class, which is pretty easy considering she tries to make the class entertaining, 10/10 jokes.
